EmailTemplate.name: VMTurbo v4.5 Prospect 1_28_2014.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo v4.5 - NetApp & UCS Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
VMTurbo just released <http://www.vmturbo.com/?p=10092> v4.5. We are extending our control system beyond the hypervisor into the converged fabric and deeper into storage.
- VMTurbo resolves virtualization performance issues with one click. It tells you the specific actions to take to resolve the issue – which VMs to move, and which hosts to move them to. It will even execute those actions for you.
- VMTurbo will now calculate actions for NetApp and Cisco UCS <http://bit.ly/1lilXre> such as provisioning new storage controllers, new ports, or spinning up a new blade – all automatically, all optimally.
Attend our webinars to learn more
- Thursday, January 30th 8:00AM - 9:00AM EST http://bit.ly/1eKySg2 - Thursday, January 30th 12:00PM - 1:00PM EST http://bit.ly/1gMwpBa
Best regards, VMTurbo
